Text: News ReleaseMr Skilling In view of the market and economy today the fact that my firm is taking aggressive steps to enable our clients might be of interest to you Please take a moment to view amscsearchcom and look at the In the News section Perhaps this will entice you to invite us to become a contributing part of the Enron team Most sincerely Kelly Crescenti Vice President AMS Crescenti Inc amscsearchcom mailto
